description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History and Illustrations of the London Theatres: comprising an account of the origin and progress of the drama in England; with historical and descriptive accounts of the Theatres Royal, Covent Garden, Drury Lane, Haymarket, English Opera House, and Royal Amphitheatre ... Illustrated with engravings", "Single Works" Author: DIBDIN, Charles Isaac Mungo. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 644.k.36."
